revised_title: A New Magnetic Detector for Electric Waves in Space Telegraphy
tldr: Marconi and Fleming describe a magnetic detector of electric waves that can be used as a receiver for space telegraphy. The detector is based on the decrease of magnetic hysteresis in iron when exposed to high-frequency or Hertzian waves. This detector is more sensitive and reliable than a coherer and can be used in long-distance space telegraphy.
